description: 3n shuffle group does not accomplish a perfect shuffle.
references: W. Bosma et al., Solving Problems with MAGMA, Sect. 2.2.3.
Cannon and Playoust, An Introduction to MAGMA, Section 6.3.1.
links: P. Diaconis, The mathematics of perfect shuffles, Adv. Appl. Math. 4 (2) (1983) 175-196.
Steve Medvedoff and Kent Morrison, Groups of perfect shuffles, Math. Mag. 60 (1987), no. 1, 3-14.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
